department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Seven Medium Trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3
description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for seven (7) Medium Trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3 in accordance with RFSA E60HP-16TRUK/B to be delivered to different locations throughout Canada.
full_summary:
**RFP 21120-234865-B Against RFSA E60HP-16TRUK-B Group 3 Truck, Medium**

* **RFP Reference**: WS3715779098-Doc4326468589
* **Release Date**: November 28, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: February 6, 2024, 2:00 pm EST

**Procurement Details**:
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous RFP solicitation number Doc3715806315 dated October 26, 2022, with a closing date of November 21, 2022. Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for seven (7) Medium Trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3 in accordance with RFSA E60HP-16TRUK/B. This requirement is open only to suppliers with a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) Supply Arrangement E60HP-16TRUK/B Group 3 Truck, Medium.

**Delivery Locations**:
The trucks are to be delivered at various locations throughout Canada, specifically in New Brunswick, Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region), Nova Scotia, Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region), and Alberta.

**Trade Agreements**:
This solicitation is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), among others.

**Contracting Entity**:
